title: Does This Photograph Show Nancy Pelosi with JFK?
subtitle: "The leadership of President John F. Kennedy is not just a memory, but a living force that still asks every citizen to lead -- and perhaps that is the most precious gift of all."
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A photograph shows U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi with President John F. Kennedy, with whom she supposedly "had an affair for seven long years."
